name: shilvasad
description: - 👋 Hi, I’m [Md Asad Chowdhary](@shilvasad) - 👀 I’m interested in Full-Stack Web Development, Machine Learning, and Contributing to Open Source. - 🌱 I’m currently learning MERN Stack Development, and exploring different types of architectural design (i.e. Microservices, DDD, FDD, etc.) - 💞️ I’m looking to collaborate on innovative web applications or AI-driven projects. - 📫 Reaching me in my [email address](mailto:asad@suyena.com), connect me on my [LinkedIn profile](https://linkedin.com/in/md-asad-chowdhary) or find more details in my [personal website](https://asad.suyena.com). - 😄 Pronouns: He/Him - ⚡ Fun fact: I dream a lot!

scripts.initiate: concurrently " mkdir server " " npm create vite@latest client -- --template react && cd client && npm install " "cd server && npm init -y && npm install express cors dotenv nodemon mongoose bcryptjs jsonwebtoken multer"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && nodemon index.js"
